name: workday-mcp/pr-copilot-mcp
description: MCP server for GitHub PR creation and analysis with AI-generated summaries using Workday CIS LLM and JIRA ticket integration - create pull requests with enhanced descriptions, generate PR summaries, analyze code changes, and JIRA ticket context with Figma links. Optimized configuration with hardcoded values for simplified deployment.

environment_variables.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
environment_variables.description: GitHub token with repository permissions for PR creation and repository access

environment_variables.name: GITHUB_OWNER
environment_variables.description: Default repository owner (optional, defaults to 'wday-planning' if not set)

environment_variables.name: JIRA_API_TOKEN
environment_variables.description: JIRA API token for Bearer authentication (optional - enables detailed ticket info in PR descriptions)
